thread.title: Disney Parks After Dark: Walt Disney’s Carousel of Progress Illuminates the Night
thread.title_full: Disney Parks After Dark: Walt Disney’s Carousel of Progress Illuminates the Night

author: Jennifer Fickley-Baker
title: Disney Parks After Dark: Walt Disney’s Carousel of Progress Illuminates the Night
text:
Tonight’s “After Dark” image was snapped in Tomorrowland at Magic Kingdom Park of the classic Walt Disney’s Carousel of Progress attraction.
The attraction has been spinning guests through a 21-minute Audio-Animatronics journey through the history of progress since it opened at the park in 1975. The attraction was originally designed by Walt Disney for the 1964-65 New York World’s Fair and currently highlights the achievements of the day in 1900, 1920, 1940 and beyond.
Is Walt Disney’s Carousel of Progress a must-do for you? Tell us in the “Comments” section below.
